page.title: 03Home life Sampford area
page.content: On Saturday I wake up and go to the yard and feed my rabbit.He is called sixer.Then I give the horses hay then I go and make the feeds up(bran,sugar beet,nuts,flaked maize,mix)but I do not feed them.I go down to the house to wake my mum up.Sometimes I eat my cornflakes and have a drink of cocoa, before I feed the horses.My mum is an instructoress.After feeding I help my mum to muck out four of the six stables.Sometimes I go out into the field and pick up the droppings,maybe Peter comes over to help me put them on the muckheap.Then Peter and I get Bubbles and Nugget and ride somewhere in Sampford Courtney.When we come back we put the ponies away and have tea.When Peter has gone home I watch T.V.At 9p.m. we give the ponies hay then I go to bed.
